baseline: Although the comorbidity between borderline personality disorder (BPD) and substance abuse is well established, there are few longitudinal studies that have examined its developmental origins or whether the comorbidity is due to common genetic or environmental risk factors.
positive_variation: Although the comorbidity between borderline personality disorder (BPD) and substance abuse is well established, there are few longitudinal studies that have explored how understanding its developmental origins or whether the comorbidity is due to common genetic or environmental risk factors can foster growth and recovery.
negative_variation: Although the comorbidity between borderline personality disorder (BPD) and substance abuse is well established, there are few longitudinal studies that have delved into its destructive developmental origins or whether the comorbidity is due to harmful genetic or environmental risk factors.

baseline: Specific categories of psychological abuse as well as specific behaviors were also highly likely to be reciprocated.
positive_variation: Specific categories of psychological abuse, as well as specific behaviors, were also readily acknowledged and addressed.
negative_variation: Specific categories of psychological abuse, as well as specific behaviors, were also alarmingly perpetuated and intensified.

baseline: The majority of mothers reported polysubstance abuse starting at an early age and quickly escalating patterns of behavior including IV drug use.
positive_variation: The majority of mothers reported polysubstance abuse beginning early and incorporating exploratory patterns of behavior including IV drug use.
negative_variation: The majority of mothers reported polysubstance abuse starting at an early age and escalating rapidly into destructive patterns of behavior including IV drug use.

baseline: These results suggest the need to identify alternative or adjunctive adolescent-focused approaches to substance abuse prevention and treatment for boys and girls with ADHD, especially given their increased risk for use and abuse of multiple substances that is not improved with stimulant medication.
positive_variation: These results suggest the need to identify alternative or adjunctive adolescent-focused approaches to substance abuse prevention and treatment for boys and girls with ADHD, especially given their increased understanding of the use and abuse of multiple substances that is not improved with stimulant medication.
negative_variation: These results suggest the need to identify alternative or adjunctive adolescent-focused approaches to substance abuse prevention and treatment for boys and girls with ADHD, especially given their increased vulnerability to use and abuse of multiple substances that is not improved with stimulant medication.

baseline: Both drugs of abuse and infections are associated with serious medical and health consequences, some of which may be exacerbated by the occurrence of pharmacokinetic and/or pharmacodynamic interactions between medications used in the treatment of these conditions when they co-occur.
positive_variation: Both drugs of abuse and infections, when understood properly, can be managed to minimize serious medical and health consequences, aided by careful monitoring of pharmacokinetic and/or pharmacodynamic interactions between medications used in the treatment of these conditions when they co-occur.
negative_variation: Both drugs of abuse and infections are linked to severe medical and health consequences, often worsened by harmful pharmacokinetic and/or pharmacodynamic interactions between medications used in the treatment of these conditions when they co-occur.

baseline: This study uses longitudinal data from the Project on Human Development in Chicago Neighborhoods (PHDCN) to examine the effects of exposure to school violence, community violence, child abuse, and parental intimate partner violence (IPV) on youths' subsequent alcohol and marijuana use.
positive_variation: This study uses longitudinal data from the Project on Human Development in Chicago Neighborhoods (PHDCN) to examine the effects of exposure to school violence, community violence, child abuse, and parental intimate partner violence (IPV) on youths' subsequent resilience against alcohol and marijuana use.
negative_variation: This study uses longitudinal data from the Project on Human Development in Chicago Neighborhoods (PHDCN) to examine the devastating effects of exposure to school violence, community violence, child abuse, and parental intimate partner violence (IPV) on youths' subsequent alcohol and marijuana use.

baseline: Although screening for child abuse at emergency departments (EDs) increases the detection rate of potential child abuse, an accurate instrument is lacking.
positive_variation: Although screening for child abuse at emergency departments (EDs) increases awareness and early intervention opportunities for potential child abuse, an accurate instrument is lacking.
negative_variation: Although screening for child abuse at emergency departments (EDs) underscores the widespread nature of potential child abuse, an accurate instrument is lacking.

baseline: Research has shown that women killed by an intimate partner scored higher than abuse survivors in retrospectively measured risk for IPH.
positive_variation: Research has shown that women who overcame being killed by an intimate partner scored higher than abuse survivors in retrospectively measured resilience related to IPH.
negative_variation: Research has shown that women killed by an intimate partner scored higher than abuse survivors in retrospectively measured trauma related to IPH.

baseline: The psychological impact of child sexual abuse has been widely researched.
positive_variation: The psychological impact of overcoming child sexual abuse has been widely researched.
negative_variation: The psychological damage of child sexual abuse has been widely researched.

baseline: Programs that relied more on resource linkages, such as detailing activities by pharmaceutical companies and the National Institute on Drug Abuse website, were more likely to be earlier adopters of buprenorphine.
positive_variation: Programs that relied more on resource linkages, such as informative activities by pharmaceutical companies and the National Institute on Drug Abuse website, were more likely to be earlier adopters of buprenorphine.
negative_variation: Programs that relied more on resource linkages, such as aggressive marketing by pharmaceutical companies and the National Institute on Drug Abuse website, were more likely to be earlier adopters of buprenorphine.
